sentences.sContent: I have seen bricks amid the oak copse there.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have seen bricks amid the oak copse there.
sentences.sCn: 我还看见过橡树林中留存着的砖头。

sentences.sContent: Quietly he walked towards her, past her, and on towards the heavy oak door.
sentences.sContent_eng: Quietly he walked towards her, past her, and on towards the heavy oak door.
sentences.sCn: 轻轻地，他走向她，慢慢地，走过去，走向那沉重的橡树门。

phrases.pCn: 橡树岭（美国田纳西州东部城市）

remMethod.val: ok中间有个a→一棵好橡树→橡树

trans.tranCn: 栎树， 橡树， 橡木
trans.tranOther: a large tree that is common in northern countries, or the hard wood of this tree
